ModMetaData.name: An Otter Hat For Otters
ModMetaData.author: XxHyde840xX/HIGGS
ModMetaData.description: Just an otter hat for otters, spun out from the Death Stranding Faction: Porters mod, located at: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1970937352. All credit to Higgs, I just yanked the hat.
